wayambaa palath sabhawe hitapu amathiwarayaku wana ashoka wadigamangawa mahatha sahabhagi wana kisidu uthsawayakata sahabhagi nowana bawata puththalama disthrik pradeshiya lekamwarun thiranaya kara atha.puththalama disapathi karyalaye niladharinda wadigamangawa mahatha sahabhagi wana awastha sandaha sahabhagi nowimata thiranaya kara athi athara ee mahathage pilikul sahagatha hasirima hethuwen mema thiranaya gath bawa puththalama athireka disapathi chandrasiri bandara mahatha dinaminata prakasha kaleya.pasugiya 24 wanada puththalama shantha andaෲ pasale thibi soyagath salakunu kala chanda pathrika adangu parsal kihipayak soya ganimen pasuwa wadigamangawa mahatha sidu kala prakasha hethuwen mema thiranaya gena atha.
